channel.title: Moparscape adding editing scripting HELP i have a windows vista and need help!
channel.description:
[font=Verdana]everytime i open the folder hybrid scape and try to change a shop name or item it doesnt let me and i cant add files for the scripts but im not even sure im supposed to do that i tried to look at other posts but i cant because [sup]"the file is either missing or off limits to you" [/sup] so i need help please post i really want to make my own server .. btw i wanted to know if there is a faster client i can use or how i can make my server not lag either please help thanks ..
-ivan
please post answers. :)[/font]
